import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Subscription } from 'rxjs'; import { Book } from '../models'; import { BookService } from '../services/book.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-results', templateUrl: './results.component.html', styleUrls: ['./results.component.css'] }) export class ResultsComponent implements OnInit { books!: Book[] keyword!: string userId!: string param$!: Subscription constructor(private ar: ActivatedRoute, private svc: BookService, private router: Router){} ngOnInit(): void { this.param$ = this.ar.params.subscribe( (params) => { this.keyword = params['keyword'] this.svc.getBooks(this.keyword) .then( result => { console.log(result) this.books = result }).catch(error => { console.log(error) }) } ) } }
